content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified)

### Second stone furnace at position(42.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 42.0, -79.0)

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace (position not specified)
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace is empty or contains the correct type of item before attempting to insert a different type of item. In this case, the furnace could not accept iron ore because it already contained copper ore.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Check that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting to extract it. In this case, the error occurred because there was no copper ore in the second furnace to extract.

### Errors when using incorrect API or methods
- Review the API documentation to ensure that the methods being used are appropriate for the intended actions. This can help prevent errors related to incorrect method usage.
